section.title: About
section.p: A casual & modernized gathering place at the Old School serving a slightly southern menu of pub fare, family style entrees, veggies and more. Come enjoy our full bar complete with beer, wine, liquor and alcohol free options. Sit in our light, airy dining room or on the patio with pastoral views.

section.title: Menu
section.p: Feather Bone offers fries either as a Basket of Fries for $5 or on the side of their sandwiches.Feather Bone MenuFeather Bone menu showing basket of fries.

section.title: Texture
section.p: These fries have the perfect balance of a crispy exterior and a fluffy interior. Whether you prefer crunchy or fluffy fries, you will enjoy these. Don't worry, it won't be one fry crunchy and the next soft, each fry has that perfect combination.

section.title: Flavor
section.p: These fries have a special fry seasoning. These seasonings elevate these fries giving them the top listing of this magazine.

section.title: Dipping Sauce
section.p: Feather and Bone features a unique dipping sauce they call BAH sauce. They describe it as: it's like ranch, but green. It is a perfect combination to match the Cajun seasoning.

section.title: Cost Value Analysis
section.p: Only $5 for a full basket of delicious fries? Great deal!

section.title: Overall
section.p: These fries are a must eat in Blacksburg, Virginia. Pair them with one of their chicken sandwiches and you won't even want to eat anywhere else!Feather Bone FriesPlate with burger, fries, orange, and milk.
